flawed_nl_solution:
He has 200 pounds of fish because 10 x 200 = <<10*200=200>>200
He has enough for 8 customers because 200 / 25 = <<200/25=8>>8
92 customers go home without any fish because 100 - 8 = <<100-8=92>>92
#### 92

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 2000, not 200. It appears a zero was dropped from the number.
